body.name: Aünsffer Bidet Attachment for Toilet, Non-Electric Fresh Cold Water, Toilet Bidet with Dual Nozzles Sprayer, Adjustable Water Pressure Control, 3 Modes Wash (Feminine/Bidet Wash + Self-Cleaning)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 32 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 1 hr 32 mins
features: Super-Slim Design and High Compatibility -- The Aünsffer toilet bidet features a super-slim design (0.2 inches), which is perfectly compatible with your toilet seat, leaving no gaps and preventing uneven stress and breakage.

2 Nozzles & 3 Modes Wash -- The bidet seat has dual nozzles for front and rear cleaning. The nozzle can be retracted up and down during use and has a self-cleaning function to ensure hygiene and cleanliness.

Adjstable Water Pressure -- The water pressure control knob on the side of the bidet allows you to easily adjust the water pressure to your preference. Water pressure can be adjusted to low, medium, or high.
Easy to clean-- ABS Premium material, no stains remain on the surface, easy to clean, the fixed part can be removed, making it easy to clean the gaps in the toilet.

What's Included: 1x Aünsffer Bidet for Toilet, 1x installation kit, 1x user manual, and a 24-month customer service. We promise to do our best to meet your needs, and if you have any questions or concerns, please contact Aünsffer Store immediately.

DIY Installation: Easy installation, please refer to the installation video on the home page. It is suitable for most 2-piece household toilets. Please confirm the size before purchasing. If you have any questions, please email us and we will try our best to help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to assemble and install, was well packaged. Works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple yet effective
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice, entry level add on bidet. The installation took less than 15 minutes in my kids' bathroom. There are no special tools required. The only additional step I took was to add some risers to underneath the toilet seat so it sits pallalel. Without the risers, the seat slanted downward a bit. This step is optional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non-Electric Toilet Bidet
reviews.reviewText: Order arrived within a few days and was packed well for shipping. Toilet bidet does require setup/installation and does come with easy to follow instructions. Bidet is durable and works as advertised and worth the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install bidet accessory, works with most toilet seats, adjustable, and slim profile
reviews.reviewText: If you have always wanted the luxury of a bidet in your home toilet, but cringe at the cost of a full bidet toilet replacement, and off you don’t mind only cool water, this is the bidet attachment solution for you. It is DIY, so you will need a handyman or handywoman to install it.All the hardware you need to connect to your existing water line, to fit under your existing toilet seat, and to adjust to your particular bidet spray needs, is included.After opening the box, familiarizing myself with the parts, removal of my toilet seat, connection to the water line, and reseating the toilet seat, took about 30 minutes. Instructions are very helpful and specific for each step in the process, and I did have the benefit of this being my second time installing a bidet attachment in our home.This model by Aunsffer has a self cleaning function, a super slim no gap under the toilet seat (so your seat doesn’t rock in place), and has a bidet wash and feminine hygiene settings. These two settings allow the best placement for the parts you want to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aünsffer Bidet: A Five-Star Upgrade for Every Bathroom!
reviews.reviewText: The Aünsffer Bidet Attachment has transformed our bathroom experience! This non-electric bidet brings a refreshing touch to personal hygiene with its cold water freshness and dual nozzles sprayer.The adjustable water pressure control is a game-changer, offering a customizable and comfortable cleansing experience. The three wash modes provide versatility to suit individual preferences, making it a truly personalized hygiene solution.Installation was surprisingly easy, even for someone with minimal plumbing skills. The bidet attachment is well-designed and durable, ensuring long-lasting performance. The dual nozzles sprayer adds an extra layer of cleanliness, and the non-electric feature is not only eco-friendly but also a cost-effective solution.In conclusion, the Aünsffer Bidet Attachment deserves a solid five stars for its functionality, ease of use, and the refreshing upgrade it brings to the bathroom. If you're considering a bidet for your toilet, this one is a top-notch choice that delivers on every aspect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Bidet, Works Well
reviews.reviewText: If you're in the market for one of these (if you're reading this, that's likely the case), this will fit the bill quite nicely. Any installation involving plumbing can be a pain, so given that, it's as easy to install as anyone could make it. I did have an advantage in that I was replacing a different model of bidet that had cracked, so it was a bit easier. I didn't like having to screw the control panel on to the main body of the bidet - one of the 3 screws stripped even though I was careful, so I'll have to keep an eye out for leaks. So far so good. The only problem I have with it is the placement of the controls. They're close to the toilet seat, and I'm a big guy, so if you're like me it takes a little leaning to get to the controls. Not a huge issue, but it would be nice if they were moved out a little. Then again, the reason my old one cracked is that I accidently pushed down to hard on the control, and the arm connecting it to the wash head cracked. Having the control closer to the seat will help that, but at the expense of having to lean a little. In any case, these are very nice devices to have, and this one will work well for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic - Get one right away!
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered and reviewed several entry-level bidets on Amazon, and this type is definitely the one that I prefer most. The ones that are built-in to the toilet seat are creaky and make the hole in the seat a lot smaller. Not so with this one.These universal bidets are wedged in between the porcelain and the toilet seat, to the opening does not change. The mounting material accommodates an incredibly wide range of distances, so it will install perfectly on just about any toilet where the sear is held in place with 2 bolts.Controls are simple (not much to it), and the pressure is excellent. I have 2 of these in my home, one of them has been around for almost a year. No problems so far.For the price, this is a must-have item. The savings in toilet paper alone will pay for it in no-time! HIGHLY recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Okay America- It's time to get in on the bidet! This thing is awesome.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have only tried a bidet once over a decade ago in a hotel in Europe. I was not overly excited about the experience then, but also had no idea what to do. I wanted to try this attachment to our toilet to give the concept another chance. I like being clean, my bum after going potty is no so much clean. Round after round of wipes gets you cleaner, but I thought a wash might be better. This attachment took me less than 10 minutes to install and was so simple. All you need is a small Phillips head screw driver and a wrench; it comes with everything else.So how did it do?Fantastic! The water did exactly what you hoped as I was completely clean on the first wipe after using it. There is a dial so you can control the pressure to whatever is most comfortable for yourself. I was concerned the water would feel too cold, but it's not at all. The whole process takes only 5-10 seconds which actually saves time and a lot of toilet paper. Most importantly, I really do feel cleaner when done.Great quality product and highly recommended to give it a try. My only problem now is that we need more of the bidets for all the toilets in the house or my bathroom is going to get far more use.
